resources.string: Allow the application %1$s to access the USB device?
Allow the application %1$s to access the USB accessory?
No installed applications work with this USB accessory. Learn more about this accessory at %1$s
Install Android File Transfer application for Mac

"Access them at any time by swiping down.
Swipe down again for system controls."
Do not remove the SD card while it is disconnecting
Enabling Extended Standby Mode in Power management will optimise battery lifetime
"This will conserve data and battery usage, but you'll need to sync each account manually to collect recent information. And you won't receive notifications when updates occur."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on your phone to the web.
To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on your device to the web.
To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data charges may apply when updating your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended."
